source_reference.text: What Does the Bible Say About Marriage? 7 Essential Facts About Christian Marriage (Video by ApplyGodsWord_MarkBallenger)

content_summary:
What does the Bible say about marriage? The Bible says a lot about marriage. In this video I will give you 7 biblical facts about Christian marriage. 

1. The Bible Says Marriage Is from God and Is Good
2. The Bible Says Marriage Is Good for Non-Christians Too
3. The Bible Says People Should Not Be Unequally Yoked in Marriage
4. The Bible Says Marriage Can Only Be Between One Man and One Woman
5. The Bible Says Marriage Creates a Unique Bond Between the Husband and Wife
6. The Bible Says What God Has Joined Together in Marriage, Man Should Not Separate
7. The Bible Says Marriage Symbolizes Christ and the Church
